IsPolicyAttachAllowed.Description: (Optional) Whether or not Quicksetup is allowed to attach policies to existing Instance profiles.

HasDeletedBaseline.Description: (Optional) Whether patch policy contains a deleted custom patch baseline.

QSType.Description: (Required) Specifies the type of the QuickSetup: either local or organizational.

QSConfigurationId.Description: (Required) Unique identifier of the deployed configuration.

QSAttachConfigurationPolicy.Description: (Optional) Whether to attach Configuration permissions policy which sets boundaries of what configuration can do.

PatchPolicyName.Description: (Required) The name of the patch policy.

SelectedPatchBaselines.Description: (Required) Stringified JSON content of selected Patch baselines.

ConfigurationOptionsPatchOperation.Description: (Required) Whether to scan for patches or install patches.

RateControlErrorThreshold.Description: (Optional) The number of errors that are allowed before the system stops sending requests to run the association on additional targets.

RateControlConcurrency.Description: (Optional) The maximum number of targets allowed to run the association at the same time.

ConfigurationOptionsScanValue.Description: (Optional) CRON or Rate Expression at which to execute the association

ConfigurationOptionsScanNextInterval.Description: (Optional) Whether or not to run the State Manager scan associations on next CRON interval.

ConfigurationOptionsInstallValue.Description: (Optional) CRON or Rate Expression at which to execute the association

ConfigurationOptionsInstallNextInterval.Description: (Optional) Whether or not to run the State Manager install associations on next CRON interval.

OutputLogEnableS3.Description: (Optional) Whether or not to send output to s3 bucket.

OutputS3Location.Description: (Optional) JSON string containing the information of the S3 bucket used for storing command output logs

OutputBucketRegion.Description: (Optional) The ID of the Region where the S3 bucket for storing command output logs is located.

OutputS3BucketName.Description: (Optional) The name of the S3 bucket where command output logs are stored.

OutputS3KeyPrefix.Description: (Optional) The directory structure in the S3 bucket where command output logs are stored.

TargetType.Description: (Optional) Specifies the way in which instances are targeted - applies only for local QuickSetup.

TargetInstances.Description: (Optional) Specifies the instances to be targeted when QSType=LA and ScanTargetType=InstanceIds.

ResourceGroupName.Description: (Optional) Specifies the resource group name to be targeted when QSType=LA and ScanTargetType=ResourceGroups

RebootOption.Description: (Optional) Reboot behavior after a patch Install operation. If you choose NoReboot and patches are installed, the instance is marked as non-compliant until a subsequent reboot and scan.

TargetTagKey.Description: (Optional) Specifies the tag key of instances to be targeted when QSType=LA and ScanTargetType=Tags

TargetTagValue.Description: (Optional) Specifies the tag value of instances to be targeted when QSType=LA and ScanTargetType=Tags

PatchBaselineRegion.Description: (Required) The region from which Patch Baselines are pulled

QSOwnerAccountId.Description: (Required) Account Id that owns the S3 bucket for baseline_overrides.json object

QSTargetOrganizationalUnits.Description: (Optional) A list of all Organizational Units (OUs) targeted for deployment

QSPrincipalOrgId.Description: (Optional) Principal Organization Id of the AWS Organization
